name: snapdrop
description: Snapdrop is a self-hosted web-based file sharing app that behaves like AirDrop in the browser. Devices on the same network can instantly exchange files without accounts.

features.title: Local File Sharing
features.description: Transfers files between devices on the same network instantly

features.title: No Installation
features.description: Works entirely in the browser without apps or software

features.title: Peer
features.description: Sends files directly between devices without server storage

features.title: Cross
features.description: Shares files between Windows, Mac, Linux, iOS, and Android

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Sends multiple files or folders in a single transfer

features.title: Device Discovery
features.description: Automatically detects nearby devices on the same network

features.title: Text Sharing
features.description: Sends text snippets and clipboard content between devices

features.title: Progressive Web App
features.description: Installs as PWA for quick access from home screen
